entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023
